data.title: Jobs at Vistry Group
data.meta_description: Careers with Vistry Group. Find out more about working for Vistry Group (including Linden Homes and Bovis Homes and Countryside Partnerships) and search and apply for jobs.
data.text:
Together we make Vistry

At Vistry Group our purpose as a responsible developer is to work in partnership to deliver sustainable homes, communities and social value, leaving a lasting legacy of places people love. At Vistry we operate across 26 regions and our role is to build homes for those that need them. We supply homes right across the UK. The homes we offer belong to different brands. Our retail brands are Bovis Homes, Linden Homes and Countryside Homes. We sell these homes on the open market to private customers and call it Business to Customer sales. A large proportion of homes we sell are through our business-to-business brand, Countryside Partnerships. Countryside Partnerships is known as our multi-tenure and regeneration brand. Our Countryside Partnerships brand works with a partner to build homes for all tenures, many of which are classed as affordable homes.

Our Partner Delivery Brand – Countryside Partnerships

Countryside Partnerships is Vistry Group’s business-to-business multi-tenure regeneration brand that helps shape Places People Love. This works alongside our retail brands, Bovis Homes, Linden Homes and Countryside Homes, and enables everyone at Vistry to create lasting communities that improve life chances and generate long term value for our partners. We are a leader in the sector and work with a significant number of Local Authorities, Housing Associations, Registered Providers and the Private Rented Sector.
